name: Explomania
description: Explomania is a physically based game with untraditional gaming mechanics. You place property modifiers within the level to determine property, strength and direction of the action.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: CPU: SSE2 instruction set support. Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DX11 with feature level 9.3 capabilities. DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 500 MB available space
